name: batch.sh
short_description:
This bash script will accept a job file as an input, and will execute everything in there sequentially and/or in parallel, for the specified number of times.

A number of options is supported to make life easier. This includes options for queuing jobs, offsetting output file numbering, running things in reverse, etc.

Run batch.sh without any arguments to get help.
summary: Parallel job execution automation script for bash
